snippet: After cycling in and out of apartments with abusive partners and living in New York City’s shelter system, Alejandrina Cruz has a place of her own.
abstract: Federation of Protestant Welfare Agencies, one of the organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, awards Alejandrina Cruz a grant to buy furniture for her apartment.
lead_paragraph: After cycling in and out of apartments with abusive partners and living in New York City’s shelter system, Alejandrina Cruz has a place of her own.

headline.print_headline: Finding in Kung Fu Movies a Refuge, and Perhaps a Calling
headline.seo: Taking Comfort in Kung Fu Movies While Healing From Past
